post.body: popcorn shrimp & flat screen tv's...rad! wen they hand u the buzzer thingy that lights up wen ur food is ready, think of moi.
all things considered... im in! but let's leave the bread puudin out along with meat pies and and and all my children episodes
idk my bad! i had oprah on the brain. and was hating on her bff... now that she's thick again, im back to watching on the regular.
oh u wanna talk huh? imma throw sum wheat crackers your way! then we'll see who's laughing? OB WHAT. lol.
sorry imma retard and new to all this tweet action. im beta right now so ill be working the kinks out.
like my boy joe namath im "stugggggling" with this whole twitter thing. sorry if they aren't making sense. im working on it.
